title: Cozy Grooves (Moody Cozy Game Soundtrack)
description: 12 tracks that are a little cute, a little moody, a little cozy and a little nostalgic.
longDescription:
Cozy Grooves is perfect for cozy games with an edge, puzzle games with a nostalgic aesthetic, base builders with a dark vibe or anything that needs a little tug at the heartstrings! 


Each track has the bpm listed in the title, and complete tracks or individual sections within each track can be easily looped at your discretion. Each track has a measure or two of “headroom” at the end for reverb/room decay, and in some case a measure of headroom at the beginning.



A trailer featuring a complete listen-only version of all tracks can be found here:

https://youtu.be/h_gedKXZfck
